page.title: 17Farming 1
page.content: This is an interview with Mr.Lachie Cameron of Ballevullin.Lachie is a crofter.He also is a coastguard How long have you been a crofter? I have been a tenant and crofting for 45 years but I have been crofting since I was a boy How many animals have you got? Well I have got 70 cows.There are 2 year old bullocks and heifers I also have 150 sheep.There are black faced,half-bread,jacobs.I've also got hoggs and gimmers. What farming implements do you have and have there been many changes in the past 45 years I've a baler,binder,wuffter,turner. It all used to be done by hand and I used to use a hayfork and rakes. But now some people have combines.
